data.name: Blossom, La Jirafa SAGA
data.detailed_description:
Blossom is a small Giraffe who lives in captivity inside the private Zoo of an unscrupulous and frivolous hunter who catches animals as a hobby.
Our heroine dreams of returning to her home, she suddenly manages to open her cage! she thus she begins her escape to Freedom. She helps her escape the Zoo in part 1 and through the City, by the Subway until she gets the Boat that will help her complete her journey in part 2.
With Graphics, Gameplay and Original Soundtrack tribute to the first home consoles, we invite you to be part of this very fun and wild adventure.

Blossom la Jirafa is a fun platform where we will guide our intrepid protagonist running and jumping obstacles on his way to freedom, along with a fun runner in his first part.
                    

A saga for the whole family.



Blossom the giraffe collects the two games launched in one with the following characteristics

* Travel together with blossom through the urban landscapes of the city until her way home avoiding the enemies who will try to grab her

* Travel through the levels, in the city, subway and ship, find fruits to recover your lives.

* Play a runner with a retro aesthetic in the first Blossom installment and a horizontal action Platformer in its sequel.

data.short_description: Enjoy the journey in this fun platform and Runner game thus begins her escape to Freedom. Help Blossom to escape the Zoo in part 1 and get the Ship to help her complete her journey in part 2.
data.supported_languages: Spanish - Spain, English, Italian, German, Czech, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4850 or NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

Data sheet:

Art and Programming: Leonel Orrut
